title: SortSite
creator: Powermapper Software
description: SortSite is a standards-based website scanning tool that helps with accessibility evaluation. It supports 508, WCAG 2, HTML validation and checks broken links. It is available as a subscription web application, a self-hosted server installation and a desktop application for Windows and Macintosh.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
<abbr title="Web Content Accessibility Guidelines">WCAG</abbr> 1.0 — <abbr title="World Wide Web Consortium">W3C</abbr> Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0
